name: Just One Jump
description:
Ever tire of the endless jumping in Mario?
Get bored with the complex systems and fluid combat of Metroid?
Why not try a platforming game that only has one jump?

Que the dramatic music!
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Play as a generic, nondescript robot
and use your parkour skills to jump over

Just One Pit


A platforming experience so unimportant

that you'll have to see to believe 

Just One Jump
-----------------------------------------------------------------

"Might as well jump
Go ahead an' jump"
-Van Halen

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Music: South Town by Riot
